name: Angel Squad
description:
Angel Squad is a 2D action game that combines the gameplay mechanics of classic brickbreakers  and vertical shooters with objectives to fulfill. 

It stars angels with upgradable caracteristics, who can use a variety of weapons.
The game is divided into missions, and contains bosses

It is being created along with its level designer. Its engine is made of pure vanilla javascript, html, and CSS. 

Angel Squad is planned to be released on browsers and android.

This is the beta version of the game.  Most background graphics, UI elements, and some sprites will be modified.

Please share any bug, opinion or suggestion you may think of.  Thank you!
